entities.description: Month during which the stimulant was misused for the first time in the past year.
Used stimulant not directed by a doctor in the past 30 days.
Number of days stimulant was used not directed by a doctor in the past 30 days.

relationships.description: Indicates the month during which the respondent first misused a stimulant in the past year.
Indicates if the respondent used a stimulant not directed by a doctor in the past 30 days.
Indicates the number of days the respondent used a stimulant not directed by a doctor in the past 30 days.
